item.title: Algo walkthrough: number of ways to decode message
item.description: The problem A message containing letters from A-Z is being encoded to numbers using the following mapping: ‘A’ -> 1 ‘B’ -> 2 … ‘Z’ -> 26 Given a non-empty string Removes one if block at least containing only digits, determine the total number of ways to decode it. The answer is guaranteed to fit in a 32-bit integer This seems to be a hint at storage of the answer rather than a hint towards the solution .
